lead_paragraph: The consent order calls for Fiat Chrysler to pay a cash fine of $70 million – equal to the largest penalty ever imposed by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration – and other significant penalties for failing to execute 23 recalls covering 11 million vehicles.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler's Consent Order With N.H.T.S.A.

snippet: The consent order calls for Fiat Chrysler to pay a cash fine of $70 million – equal to the largest penalty ever imposed by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration – and other significant penalties for failing to execute 23 recalls...
